mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order_detail (order_id, order_detail_name, order_detail_png, order_detail_total, order_detail_num, order_detail_boxfee, order_express_name, order_express_phone, order_express_num, order_express_desc) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDetailPng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDetailTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderDetailNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderDetailBoxfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderExpressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderExpressPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderExpressNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderExpressDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select order_detail_id, order_id, order_detail_name, order_detail_png, order_detail_total, order_detail_num, order_detail_boxfee, order_express_name, order_express_phone, order_express_num, order_express_desc from order_detail
